item.title: My New Post
item.description: #This is a python code chunk x=['p', 'y', 't', 'h', 'o', 'n'] x[2:4] ## ['t', 'h'] library(reticulate) #this is an R code chunk py$x ## [1] "p" "y" "t" "h" "o" "n"

item.title: Project 1
item.description: Introduction The data sets I have chosen are all related to the NBA. I thought it would be very interesting if I were to gather data regarding past NBA Champions. I found these data online through different websites. I wanted to find associations regarding awards that were given that year in regard to who the champions were. This information is interesting to me because I have always been a huge basketball fan.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.
